title: Breaking the Meta team
body: want to make a team for breaking the meta team , i have been playing alot of ap rengar and ap xin , if anyone wants to join me in this quest it will be good , all rank are welcome and it only normals so it for fun

replies.body: Im so down for this... I started to pick "strange" choices and get my head ripped off in the process.  What really interest's me is also changing the game play format of one top, one midm two bot and one jun. Why??!?! There are other ways.

damn ur NA so cant LOL
0
One funny one I tried Heim jun, was not very good. His turrets take to long to reload but awesome at ganks. wait for enemy team to push into our turrets then just line up some q's.... BAM!

Yes love to break the meta 
i love doing things from Sona jungle , brand/annie bot lane, elise and sejuani mid just anything really
